text1: Various kinds of data that will be auto-linked. In this text are some things that are actionable. For instance, you can click on http://www.baidu.com and it will launch the web browser. You can click on baidu.com too. If you click on (415) 555-1212 it should dial the phone. Or just write foobar@example.com for an e-mail link.
text2: Explicit links using <a> markup. This has markup for a link specified via an <a> tag. Use a \"tel:\" URL to dial a phone number.
